ai-patthana18.15:0.2_0: (This should be expanded as in the teachings,)
ai-patthana18.15:1.1_0: Or a cause of defilement doesn’t give rise to three conditions for the sake of defiling.
ai-patthana18.15:2.1_0: Because of Defilement, not because of defilements.
ai-patthana18.15:3.1_0: No cause for the sake of defilements ...
ai-patthana18.15:4.1_0: Not because of Defilement, the cause of defilements is for the sake of having ended.
